title: aria-colcount attribute
description: Defines the total number of columns in a table, grid, or treegrid. See related aria-colindex.

assertions.title: convey the total column count when some columns are hidden
assertions.rationale: The user needs to know how many columns are in the whole grid / table when some columns are hidden

assertions.title: convey a column count when total column count is unknown
assertions.rationale: Screen readers should not attempt to calculate the column count when it is unknown
assertions.notes: ARIA 1.1 spec: "If the total number of columns is unknown, authors MUST set the value of aria-colcount to -1 to indicate that the value should not be calculated by the user agent."
